item.title: Charlie Kirk’s killer blended in on Utah university campus, and a high-powered rifle is recovered
item.description: President Donald Trump says he’ll posthumously award conservative activist and ally Charlie Kirk the Presidential Medal of Freedom.

item.title: Assassination of Charlie Kirk adds to America’s roll call of public violence
What to know about the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk
